Header.title: CARFIX AI
Header.paragraph: This user-friendly AI car diagnosis app not only enables users to input symptoms or prompts for issue identification but also offers DIY-friendly guidance, allowing owners to tackle some of the maintenance or repairs themselves, ultimately promoting self-sufficiency and cost savings.

About.paragraph: Begin by choosing the year, make, and model of your car from the available options. This ensures that the diagnostic process is tailored to the specific characteristics of your vehicle.
About.paragraph2: Opt for a quick symptom check to explore common issues associated with your car's make and model. Alternatively, create a custom prompt to describe specific symptoms you've observed. The flexibility allows you to pinpoint your car's unique problems.
About.paragraph3: Once you've inputted the necessary details, our advanced AI system takes over. It thoroughly analyzes the symptoms or custom prompt and cross-references them with a vast database of automotive issues.
About.paragraph4: The AI swi`ftly identifies the most common issues related to the symptoms you provided or suggests potential problems based on your custom prompt. This step ensures a comprehensive diagnosis.

Features.title: Intuitive User Interface
Features.text: The app offers an easy-to-use interface for quick and accessible car issue diagnosis.

Features.title: Comprehensive Symptom Selection
Features.text: Users can select from a wide range of symptoms to accurately describe their car's problems.

Features.title: Real-Time Diagnosis
Features.text: The AI engine provides real-time issue identification, enabling prompt problem resolution.

Features.title: DIY Repair Guidance
Features.text: The app also offers step-by-step repair guidance, promoting cost-effective do-it-yourself solutions.
